## News Source Information

### Source Name
Name of the cybersecurity news source

### Source URL
Main URL of the news source

### RSS Feed URL (if available)
Direct link to RSS/Atom feed

## Source Credibility

### Why This Source?
Explain why this source should be added:
- Reputation in cybersecurity community
- Quality of content
- Update frequency
- Unique coverage areas

### Content Type
- [ ] Breaking news
- [ ] Vulnerability disclosures
- [ ] Threat intelligence
- [ ] Security research
- [ ] Industry analysis
- [ ] Other: [specify]

## Technical Details

### Content Format
- [ ] RSS/Atom feed available
- [ ] Requires web scraping
- [ ] API available
- [ ] Other: [specify]

### Update Frequency
- [ ] Multiple times daily
- [ ] Daily
- [ ] Weekly
- [ ] Other: [specify]

### Special Considerations
- Rate limiting requirements
- Authentication needed
- JavaScript rendering required
- Other technical challenges

## Additional Information
Any other relevant information about this source.
